messages.message:
In Converse:
No way to know if I’m in Advanced mode or not.
So I could be using more units than I need to for simple queries.

Yup, that’s true. but I could be a new user (as are most of our customers) I don’t know that it stays on Advanced. Hypothetically I burn through my credits on Advanced and the whole time get frustrated that it’s slow… Then realise my mistake to late, and now I’m frustrated and annoyed
speaking from experience. I blame the person that hired me …
Makes sense, I'll create a ticket to look into the visibility improvement for selected model
